personalInfo.name: IRFAN ALI
personalInfo.title: Senior Software Engineer | DevOps & Cloud Architect

professionalSummary: Full Stack Engineer with 7+ years of progressive experience building scalable web and mobile applications across Fintech, SaaS, and AI platforms. Specialized in designing robust, end-to-end systems with React/Next.js frontends and Node.js/Golang microservices backends. Proven track record of delivering high-impact features that power real-time systems handling millions in transactions and serving 50K+ users. Expertise in distributed architectures, cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP), and DevOps practices that drive business outcomes.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
experience.contextStatement: Led end-to-end development for a comprehensive fintech ecosystem:
achievements: Architected and scaled (msq.market) platform from concept to serving 50K+ users, handling ~$500M in deposits and 30K+ daily transactions using React, Node.js, AWS, and Redis
Designed and implemented microservices architecture, reducing deployment times by 50% and system incidents by 30% through domain-driven service boundaries
Built real-time translation platform (mustbreak.ai) serving 200+ enterprise clients; optimized by migrating from OpenAI to custom NLP models, reducing latency by 35% and costs by 40%
Developed multi-tenant HR system with customizable hiring pipelines and integrated messaging (email/WhatsApp), doubling recruiter productivity for 25+ client companies
Implemented comprehensive observability stack (Redash, Mixpanel, GA) with custom alerting, enabling critical bug identification within hours instead of days
Streamlined CI/CD with automated testing and conditional deployments within monorepo architecture, enabling daily releases and 70% faster feature delivery

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Modernized rewards platform (myalfred.com) by migrating from Next.js 8 to 13, implementing server components and optimizing for 30K+ active users with 200+ daily reward claims
Engineered key features for (findmynanny.ae), including matching algorithm, Stripe payment integration, and geolocation services, resulting in 500+ registered caregivers and 100+ successful matches
Enhanced core insurance platform (insurancemarket.ae) transaction flows, supporting 100K+ active users and 200K+ policyholders with secure, high-volume operations
Created containerized development environment with Docker, Docker Compose, and Tilt, reducing onboarding time from 1.5 days to hours and ensuring consistent environments
Implemented Git workflow automation and real-time tooling, decreasing cycle time by 35% across multiple projects

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Developed one-click deployment engine for full-stack applications with Kubernetes on GCP, reducing project setup from weeks to minutes through automated infrastructure provisioning
Implemented micro-frontends architecture using Webpack Module Federation and Nx, enabling dynamic feature injection for client-specific applications with 40% code reuse
Built workflow orchestration platform for client onboarding with Twilio and WebRTC integration, streamlining intake, approvals, task assignments and payment tracking
Created bullion management dashboard for Sprott Money (sprottmoney.com), enabling real-time monitoring of metal storage, pricing, and automated invoice generation
Delivered multiple MVPs under tight deadlines, focusing on scalable architecture and maintainable codebases despite rapid business pivots

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Built and maintained Digital Plattform MRM (digitalplattform.se), a multi-tenant marketing resource management solution used by 20+ companies for campaign planning and automation
Developed interactive real-time dashboards for monitoring campaign performance and budgets, improving client decision-making capabilities
Integrated social media APIs (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Google Ads) through microservices for automated content scheduling and campaign management
Contributed to CloseBuy (closebuy.se) e-commerce platform launch, serving 17.5K+ users with $625K+ in sales; implemented Klarna, Swish, and Swedish Bank ID authentication
Published reusable UI component libraries as npm packages with Storybook documentation, achieving 50% code reuse across products

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Developed features for national-level student portal (piaic.org) supporting 200K+ students across Pakistan as part of presidential AI education initiative
Built secure online examination system with safe browser integration, handling thousands of concurrent users during peak evaluation periods
Created student progress tracking system with real-time insights into pass/fail rates and exam participation for administrators
Developed comprehensive admin panel for managing student data, submissions, and course progression, streamlining academic operations
